attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Extend our participation in the re-structuring of post- genocide Rwandan education sytem by facilitating more eduaction professionals to help schools develop with adequte resources and support. The schools are still IMMENSELY poor and under-resourced for even a basic education When working there recently with VSO NAHT it was very obvious that there was not a Union Jack to be seen on any of the signage which denoted support.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
